overview:
Andy is co-founder and product lead of Lifecrowd.

Prior to Lifecrowd, he was co-founder and product lead at MyTownDeal and CloudFi. He was also Director of Technology Architecture at ETRADE Financial focused on web, services, security and mobile frameworks. Prior to that role, he led online security product management at ETRADE. He previously was CTO of Christianity.com and CTO of online education pioneer VCampus.

He has a MBA from Columbia Business School and BSE from Princeton University.
